memberdef.type: startuml INFOS title Project Architecture skinparam Padding allow_mixing COMPONENTS package describing just the essential steps performed in communicating between packages the *package temporal diagram *represents how different independe packages work together the *node temporal diagram *is more specific and goes deeper into how the nodes communicate each other the square note is used for exposing scenarios and hypotheses the rhomboid annotation underlines an operation inside the node or the package **package temporal diagram **The
memberdef.definition: startuml INFOS title Project Architecture skinparam Padding allow_mixing COMPONENTS package describing just the essential steps performed in communicating between packages the* package temporal diagram* represents how different independe packages work together the* node temporal diagram* is more specific and goes deeper into how the nodes communicate each other the square note is used for exposing scenarios and hypotheses the rhomboid annotation underlines an operation inside the node or the package** package temporal diagram** The RCL
memberdef.name: RCL
